column2: "Hey, who's that guy? I'm getting a really bad vibe from him."

"He's human, right?
But what's that..."
"Uhh, partner? Do you know this guy? No, I guess you wouldn't."
"...I'll kill you."

"Woah! Hey, now!
...Did we do something to piss him off?"
"Die while you're still-"
"Heh, I took this mission out of boredom, but it looks like things might get interesting."

"Looks like I found someone to play with...
Fwahahaha...haha..."
"Mmmmm... Hey! Sina! Who is this guy? Hurry and look him up!"
"Right away..."
"Hmm...? Master Gettemhart... his information is not in the database."
"What?"
"Damn it, he got away. Just when I thought I was going to have some fun."
"It's one weirdo after another. What the hell is going on here?"
"Hey! You there!"
"M-me?"
"Can it, pipsqueak! I'm not talking to you."
"You there! That guy was after you, right? What's his deal?"
"1. I have no idea!"
"2. Thank you for saving us."
"You don't know? Playing dumb won't get you anywhere."
"Thank you? Fwahahaha haha... what a little brat you are!"
"Save your sentiment for the Darkers. I want that guy's information."
"Whatever. From that dumb look on your face, I'm guessing you really don't know."
"You look like you might be fun to play with one day ...but you're still too weak for now."
"Damn it, now I'm bored again. Let's go, Sina!"
"Yes, Master Gettemhart."
"<%me>, please excuse us."
"What just happened...? Somehow, I feel exhausted."
"By the way Partner, before that battle happened, you looked worried about a certain direction. Was something there?"
"Did you hear someone...? If it's a voice calling for help, it must be important."
"What will you do...? Did you want to go there? I'll leave it to you, Partner."
"You can now call Afin as a partner."
"The Masked Figure"
"Ch. 1: The Long-Awaited Tomorrow"
